recordTypes.name: Fire - Commercial Fire Plan Review Application
recordTypes.description: This application should be completed for all commercial building and anything other than a 1, 2 or 3 family dwelling.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Board of Review Application
recordTypes.description: Application to the Zoning Board of Review for consideration of request for Special Use, Dimensional Variance, Modification Granted by Zoning Officer, and Extension Request.

recordTypes.name: Planning Application
recordTypes.description: Subdivision & Land DevelopmentApplications

recordTypes.name: Fire - Residential Plan Review Application
recordTypes.description: To be completed for all 1, 2 or 3 family residences.

recordTypes.name: Shed Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to build a shed from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Deck Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a deck permit from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Finish Basement Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to finish a basement from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: New Home Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to build a new home from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Fire - Food Vendor Registration
recordTypes.description: This application must be completed by all food vendors

recordTypes.name: New Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to build a new commercial structure from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: General Building - Addition, Renovation, Remodel,  Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit for rehabilitation work, expanding an existing structures footprint and building alterations from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Foundation Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit for rehabilitation work, expanding an existing structures footprint and building alterations from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Siding Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to install siding from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Barn/Garage Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a  permit to construct a garage or barn from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Window/Door Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to replace windows/doors from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Pool Installation Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a permit to install a pool (above or inground) from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Roofing Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a roofing permit from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for an electrical permit from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a mechanical permit from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a plumbing permit from the Town of Scituate, and (if applicable) apply for a related Fire Plan Review from the Fire Marshal.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a demolition permit from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Moving Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a moving permit from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a sign permit from the Town of Scituate. All permit applications should include photos of any existing signage.

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a solar permit from the Town of Scituate.

recordTypes.name: Tent Permit
recordTypes.description: Apply for a temporary tent

categories.name: Building Department
categories.content: Submit one form to apply for permits.
